summary: The diff implements all three requirements. REQ-2 is addressed in useSubmitAdmissionForm.ts (no frontend ID generation, backend-returned ID used exclusively). REQ-1 is addressed in backend/main.mo (sequential numeric ID returned on submission) and frontend AdmissionFormPage.tsx (displays backend-returned ID). REQ-3 is addressed in useSubmitAdmissionForm.ts (MobileAlreadyRegisteredError with existingAdmissionID) and backend/main.mo (duplicate mobile check). All acceptance criteria appear to be met based on the diff evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: A migration module (backend/migration.mo) was added that transforms createdAt fields from Nat to Int for both candidates and newsItems.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request makes no mention of a data migration or changing the createdAt field type. This is a schema migration not requested in any REQ.
